name: PHVS_TNMPathologicStageDescriptor_NAACCR
title: TNM Pathologic Stage Descriptor (NAACCR)
description: Code for the the AJCC pathologic stage (prefix/suffix) descriptor as defined by AJCC. Identify special cases that need separate data analysis.

concept.display: E & S (Extranodal and spleen, lymphomas only)
M & Y (Multiple primary tumors and initial multimodality therapy)
M (Multiple primary tumors in a single site)
Unknown, not stated in patient record
Y (Classification during or after initial multimodality therapy)â€”pathologic staging only
